name: Survivor Jones
description:
Taking inspiration from old arcade games like Frogger and Pitfall, with fast paced game-play and a combination of arcade style and rogue lite mechanics.

Fight across 32+ levels, collect coins and purchase magical cards that will provide you with special abilities to assist progress through the unexpected traps, puzzles and bosses in a variety of biomes.

This game is currently being sold as a playable beta and will continue to be a work in progress until all 4 chapters of the game have been released. All further updates of the game will be included in the original purchase price.
